attributes.action: Leadership challenge candidates spend a week with a family on universal credit.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure the candidates understand what life is like for those in the lower income percentage of the population.
attributes.background: Have an independent panel ( such as frontline benefit office staff in different areas of the country) select the families to take part to ensure no bias.

rejection.details: It is not the responsibility of Government or Parliament to decide who individual MPs choose to engage with. This would ultimately be a decision for the individual MP or for each political party.
